item.title: TextBar - How to show Bitcoin Graphs
item.description: TextBar is a tiny but powerful app that lets you add any text to your MenuBar. Step 1 - Install TextBar - App / Details here Step 2 - Visit Coinbase.com in Safari (to get approval cookies) Step 3 - Download Bitcoin Graphs Step 4 - Double click downloads to install Bitcoin Graphs Step 5 - Enjoy!!
